import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new driver"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/driver"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create handles the HTTP request to create a new driver.
It parses the request body into a CreateDriverDTO, validates the input,
and delegates the creation logic to the driverService. If successful,
it returns the created driver with HTTP 201 status. On error, it responds
with HTTP 422 and an error message.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"correlation_id":{"maxLength":50,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"name":{"maxLength":100,"minLength":3,"type":"string"}},"required":["correlation_id","name"],"type":"object"}}},"description":"Driver Data","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Created","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"correlation_id":{"type":"string"},"created_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"},"deleted_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"},"id":{"type":"integer"},"name":{"type":"string"},"ulid":{"type":"string"},"updated_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}}},"422":{"description":"Unprocessable Entity","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
